meanings.definition: A device used for thickening or concentrating a liquid by evaporation.
meanings.sent1: The inspissator helped make the soup thicker.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician used the inspissator to concentrate the solution.
meanings.sent3: The inspissator was feeling proud of its ability to make liquids thicker.
meanings.sent4: The inspissator worked like a magician, turning watery mixtures into dense concoctions.
meanings.sent5: With the inspissator, the liquid transformed into a dense, syrupy substance.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that inspissates.
meanings.sent1: The chef was an inspissator, always making sauces thicker.
meanings.sent2: The inspissator of the group, she always made decisions that led to more complexity.
meanings.sent3: The inspissator teddy bear seemed to make everything around it denser.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as an inspissator, making the atmosphere heavier with tension.
meanings.sent5: He was like an inspissator of emotions, thickening the air with his presence.
